quoteText:
You can stop receiving promotional email communications from us by clicking on the “unsubscribe link” provided in such communications.
We make every effort to promptly process all unsubscribe requests.
You may not opt out of service-related communications (e.g., account verification, transactional communications, changes/updates to features of the Service, technical and security notices).
title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states that "you can stop receiving promotional email communications from us by clicking on the “unsubscribe link” provided in such communications. We make every effort to promptly process all unsubscribe requests. You may not opt out of service-related communications (e.g., account verification, transactional communications, changes/updates to features of the Service, technical and security notices)."
